      T createProxy(T root, Class<?> interfaceClass, ICommentProcessor interfaceImpl)

    • Method Detail

      • createProxy

        public T createProxy(T root,
            Class<?> interfaceClass,
            ICommentProcessor interfaceImpl)
              throws Exception
        Creates a proxy object that is able to answer calls to all methods defined in the specified root object as well as all methods defined in the specified interface class.
        Parameters:
        root - the root object which is extended to support the specified interface.
        interfaceClass - the interface by which the root object is to be extended.
        interfaceImpl - object implementing the specified interface. Calls on the interface are delegated to this object.
        Returns:
        a proxy object implementing the interface of the specified root object as well as the specified interface class.
        Throws:
        Exception - in case a proxy could not be created.
